body.name: Gospire Rechargeable Travel Makeup Mirror with Lights and Magnification 10X, Foldable Stand & Angle Sensor Light, 3 Light Colors & Stepless Dimming, Lighted Mirror LED Vanity Mirror - White

features: 【Folding & Standing】Elevate your beauty routine with a design that allows for both folding and standing. With its extended heights, it ensures that you can easily see every detail while maintaining a comfortable posture for extended periods of makeup application. And when it's time to hit the road, its effortless portability allows you to effortlessly fold it up and take it anywhere with you. Experience the functionality of a standing mirror and the portability of folding mirrors, all in one.

【Angle-Activated Smart Sensor Lighting】Discover the ultimate makeup mirror experience with our revolutionary sensing design. When the angle between the mirror and the stand exceeds 30°, the lights will automatically turn on. Conversely, when the angle is less than 30°, the lights will automatically turn off. Step into a world of personalized lighting perfection, effortlessly illuminating your surroundings without the hassle of searching for a switch.

【1800 mAh Rechargeable Battery & Wireless Use】Enjoy the freedom of a cordless mirror with wireless and rechargeable design. With a powerful 1800 mAh battery, you can effortlessly use your mirror on-the-go for up to several weeks on a single charge. This feature is perfect for travelers or those who prefer a clutter-free vanity. Enjoy the ultimate convenience of using your mirror anywhere, at any time - no cords, no hassle.

【1X/Detachable 10X Magnetic Magnifying Mirror】Enjoy the luxury of perfect magnification with our advanced 1X / 10X magnifying mirror that allows you to see every detail of your makeup, hair, and face. The 1X magnification is ideal for an overall view, while the 10X magnification lets you perform precise tasks such as applying mascara or inserting contact lenses with ease. The detachable 10X magnetic magnifying mirror can be used separately as a portable mirror when you're on the go.

【3 Light Colors & Stepless Dimming】Elevate your makeup routine with our lighted mirror that offers 3 different light colors to match any environment - White, Natural and Warm. With stepless dimming, you can easily adjust the brightness to achieve your desired lighting level. Say goodbye to harsh and unflattering lighting, and hello to the perfect lighting for any situation.

【Ideal Gift Choice】Looking for the perfect gift for your loved ones? Look no further than our light up mirror! It makes for an excellent present for any occasion, whether it's a birthday, anniversary, Mother's Day, Valentine's Day, or Christmas. Your sisters, wife, girlfriend, and mother will all appreciate this thoughtful and functional gift that will add a touch of luxury to their daily beauty routine. Give them the gift of flawless makeup application with our light up mirror!

【Guaranteed Satisfaction with Support】Your satisfaction is our top priority. We stand behind the quality of our product and offer an 12-month warranty and a 60-day refund guarantee. If for any reason you are not completely satisfied with your purchase, please contact us and we will respond promptly to provide you with a solution that meets your needs. Our customer service team is available 24/7 to assist you with any questions or concerns you may have.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Revolutionary Convenience Unleashed！ Foldable Stand & Automatic Lighting
Steps for Standing Use Step 1: Fold the stand backward until the angle between the stand and the base forms a 90° angle Step 2: Flip the entire mirror upward from the lower part of the mirror surface
Automatic Lighting On/Off with 30° The smart sensor can remember the color and brightness of the last time the lights turned off automatically.

Stepless & 3 Light Colors Left Power Sensor: Short touch to turn on/off the LED lights. Press and hold to adjust the light brightness. Right Light Sensor: Short touch to change the light color: White / Warm / Natural.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Travel
reviews.reviewText: This Mirror is Great for Traveling & A Good Size

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars compact and cute
reviews.reviewText: the lighting is very bright, however there is a softer setting you can try in case it’s too bright. i love that it came with a little mini magnifying mirror that is also magnetic, so you can stick it onto the main product to use, and when stored you can stick it on the outside of the mirror so it doesn’t get lost.i also like that it doesn’t have to use batteries and you can just charge it when the lights no longer work. virtually gassle free and you don’t have to continuously buy AAs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The first item sent was missing and was never delivered by USPS. So this review is for the replacement item.It's a mirror. Well it's a lighted mirror. It's a portable lighted mirror. It works it's clear and the lighted part is nice. Couldn't ask for anything more. It's well made with no complaints or issues.Great product overall. Definitely satisfied.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars BEWARE: No 10x mirror for smaller size
reviews.reviewText: I thought I would get a 10x mirror with the 7.5x5.1 mirror, but did not get it. Marketing feels a bit misguided. The product label/sticker on the box also reads "Gospire Rechargeable Travel Makeup Mirror with Lights and Magnification 10X, Foldable Stand & Angle Sensor Light, 3 Lighting Modes & Stepless Dimming, Lighted Mirror LED Vanity Mirror" Disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Was all good girlfriend loved it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this mirror!
reviews.reviewText: I got this for travel, but I keep in my work desk at home. I absolutely love it for the look and functionality ! I would definitely buy this for someone as a gift. I've used it multiple time and just recently had to recharge. Worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got this one because my last LED mirror had no battery life. This mirror has a great stand so I don’t have to prop it up on something. There’s also so many different LED variations and brightness

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I bought this one because it stands up higher.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for traveling. I like that is syands higher and the 10 magnification mirror. Hopefully it holds up well.
